ygData.subject: stats
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, I m about to start my first bard character and I was wondering what recommendations people had for how to assign the ability points during character
ygData.messageBody:
Hey,

I'm about to start my first bard character and I was wondering what
recommendations people had for how to assign the ability points during
character creation. What attributes are important? How much to each?

Since they are part fighter, strength sounds like it could use some. Maybe
some stamina. Their songs, what would that be? Intelligence?

Do you really need much charisma? seems like you could use one of your
songs to enhance your charisma when necessary

Thanks,

---
Jesse <j@...>
http://www.lumiere.net/
